lead_paragraph: National Football League Commissioner Roger Goodell said he would like see the Bills remain in Buffalo but conceded the team's future could hinge on the construction of a new stadium.

headline.main: NFL-New Stadium Key to Bills Staying in Buffalo-Report
headline.print_headline: NFL-New Stadium Key to Bills Staying in Buffalo-Report

snippet: National Football League Commissioner Roger Goodell said he would like see the Bills remain in Buffalo but conceded the team's future could hinge on the construction of a new stadium....
